price: ទ្រង់ពិតជានឹងបញ្ចូលពួកគេទៅតាមច្រកចូលដែលពួកគេ ពេញចិត្ដវា(ឋានសួគ៌)។ ហើយពិតប្រាកដណាស់ អល់ឡោះមហា ដឹង មហាអត់ធ្មត់។
arabic: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yarḍawnahu wa-inna al-laha laʿalīmun ḥalīmun
